SEARCH
Package Presentation

Class MainViewController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.MainViewController
public class MainViewController extends Object
The MainViewController class is responsible for managing the main display frame and interacting with the PresentationController to handle user input and actions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    MainViewController(PresentationController pc)
    Constructs a new MainViewController with the specified PresentationController.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainViewController

      public MainViewController(PresentationController pc) throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Constructs a new MainViewController with the specified PresentationController.
      Parameters:
      pc - The PresentationController to be associated with this MainViewController.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during initialization.
      NotContainsKey - if a required key is not found during initialization.

  • Method Details

    • listKeyboard

      public String[] listKeyboard() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Retrieves the list of available keyboards from the PresentationController.
      Returns:
      An array of Strings representing the list of available keyboards.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.
      NotContainsKey - if a required key is not found during the operation.

    • getDistribution

      public char[][] getDistribution(String name) throws NotContainsKey
      Retrieves the distribution of characters for the specified keyboard name from the PresentationController.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the keyboard to retrieve the distribution for.
      Returns:
      A 2D char array representing the distribution of characters.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - if the specified keyboard name is not found.

    • addKeyboard

      public void addKeyboard(String text, String text1, String text2) throws IncorrectType, IOException, NotContainsKey, ContainsKey
      Adds a new keyboard with the specified parameters using the PresentationController.
      Parameters:
      text - The key for the new keyboard.
      text1 - The transKey for the new keyboard.
      text2 - The algorithm to be used by the new keyboard.
      Throws:
      IncorrectType - If an incorrect type is encountered during keyboard creation.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during keyboard creation.
      NotContainsKey - If the PresentationController does not contain the specified key.
      ContainsKey - If the PresentationController already contains the specified key.

    • deleteKeyboard

      public void deleteKeyboard(String name) throws NotContainsKey, IOException, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes the keyboard with the specified name using the PresentationController.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the keyboard to be deleted.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified name is not found in the PresentationController.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during keyboard deletion.
      NotContainsKey - If the keyboard does not exist.
      FileNotDeleted - If an error occurs during the file keyboard deletion.

    • evaluateKeyboard

      public double evaluateKeyboard(String text, String text1) throws NotContainsKey
      Evaluates the keyboard based on two input texts and returns a double value representing the evaluation result.
      Parameters:
      text - The first input text for keyboard evaluation.
      text1 - The second input text for keyboard evaluation.
      Returns:
      A double value representing the evaluation result.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the provided input texts do not contain the necessary keys for evaluation.

    • modifyKeyboard

      public void modifyKeyboard(String key, int i1, int j1, int i2, int j2) throws NotContainsKey, IOException
      Modifies the positions of characters on a specified keyboard.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the keyboard.
      i1 - The row index of the first position.
      j1 - The column index of the first position.
      i2 - The row index of the second position.
      j2 - The column index of the second position.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Keyboard file.

    • listTransitions

      public String[] listTransitions() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Retrieves an array of transitions from the presentation controller.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the list of transitions.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.

    • restart

      public void restart() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Restarts the application by initializing the display.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the display initialization.
      NotContainsKey - If a required key is not found during the display initialization. This exception is specific to the application's logic.
